body:
r? @aturon

(rust_highfive has picked a reviewer for you, use r? to override)
Maybe I could just have rustdoc treat _only_ `#![feature` specially as a hack to get this done.
I've run into another major problem: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/23616. This isn't as close to ready as I thought.

I had a couple minor nits but basically am OK trying to get this landed (due to the bitrot issues).

I do worry a bit about adding yet more ways that tests can pedantically fail, which can be very annoying...

I'm putting the rollup (#23654) ahead of this b/c it includes this inside of it. (just FYI)
:umbrella: The latest upstream changes (presumably #23654) made this pull request unmergeable. Please resolve the merge conflicts.
